TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class SqlBulkCopyColumnMappingCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

span.span: Collection of objects that inherits from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行對應會定義資料來源和目標資料表之間的對應。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定義對應，也就是集合是空的 — 資料行的序數位置上對應隱含型。If mappings are not defined—that is, the collection is empty—the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 針對此目的，必須符合來源和目標結構描述。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 如果沒有，就會擲回。If they do not, an is thrown. 如果集合不是空的不是每個資料來源中包含的資料行必須指定。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 未對應的集合都會被忽略。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 您可以依名稱或序數參考來源和目標資料行。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 您可以混合依名稱和相同的對應集合中的 order by 序數資料行參考。You can mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製中的來源資料表中的資料**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不會相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 加入至針對建立大量複製的資料行對應的物件。 are added to the for the object to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立的工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範使用語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，它是您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a new to the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製中的來源資料表中的資料**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不會相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 物件用來建立大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立的工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範使用語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，它是您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的對應必須一致： 所有整數/整數配對、 字串/字串的所有組、 所有整數/字串組或所有的字串/整數配對。Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs. 如果您嘗試新增已在集合中，不同於其他對應就會擲回。If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製中的來源資料表中的資料**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不會相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 物件用來建立使用的來源和目的地資料行的序數位置的大量複製的資料行對應。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy using the ordinal position of the source and destination columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立的工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範使用語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，它是您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollectionOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的對應必須一致： 所有整數/整數配對、 字串/字串的所有組、 所有整數/字串組或所有的字串/整數配對。Mappings in a collection must be uniform: either all integer/integer pairs, all string/string pairs, all integer/string pairs, or all string/integer pairs. 如果您嘗試新增已在集合中，不同於其他對應就會擲回。If you try to add a mapping that is different from others already in the collection, an is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會大量複製中的來源資料表中的資料**AdventureWorks**相同資料庫中的目的地資料表的範例資料庫。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 雖然在來源中的資料行數目相符目的地資料行的數目，資料行名稱和序數位置並不會相符。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 程式碼會建立藉由指定的資料行名稱的物件。The code creates a object by specifying the column names. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立的工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範使用語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，它是您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingCollection/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

span.span: Clears the contents of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法最常用於當您使用單一執行個體來處理多個大量複製作業。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果您建立一個大量複製作業的資料行對應時，必須先清除之後方法及處理下一步 的大量複製之前。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must clear the after the method and before processing the next bulk copy. 執行數個使用相同的大量複製執行個體通常更有效率的方式是從效能觀點來看比使用個別每項作業。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 下列範例會執行兩個大量複製作業。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一項作業會複製銷售訂單標頭資訊，以及第二個複製的銷售訂單詳細資料。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 雖然不是絕對必要在此範例中 （因為來源和目的地資料行的序數位置確實相符），此範例會定義每個大量複製作業的資料行對應。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 之後第一次的大量複製在執行，而且複本的資料行對應會定義下一步 大量前，必須使用的方法。The method must be used after the first bulk copy is performed and before the next bulk copy's column mappings are defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立的工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範使用語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，它是您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdersDetails/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法最常用於當您使用單一執行個體來處理多個大量複製作業。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果您建立一個大量複製作業的資料行對應時，您必須移除後將無法再套用的對應方法會呼叫之前先定義下一步 的大量複製的對應。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy. 您可以使用，以清除整個集合方法或使用個別的移除對應方法或方法。You can clear the entire collection by using the method, or remove mappings individually using the method or the method. 執行數個使用相同的大量複製執行個體通常更有效率的方式是從效能觀點來看比使用個別每項作業。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## Examples 下列範例會執行兩個大量複製作業。The following example performs two bulk copy operations. 第一項作業會複製銷售訂單標頭資訊，以及第二個複製的銷售訂單詳細資料。The first operation copies sales order header information, and the second copies sales order details. 雖然不是絕對必要在此範例中 （因為來源和目的地資料行的序數位置確實相符），此範例會定義每個大量複製作業的資料行對應。Although not strictly necessary in this example (because the ordinal positions of the source and destination columns do match), the example defines column mappings for each bulk copy operation. 這兩個大量複製包含的對應**SalesOrderID**，而非清除之間大量複製作業，範例中移除整個集合以外的所有對應，因此**SalesOrderID**對應，並將新增第二個大量複製作業的適當對應。Both bulk copies include a mapping for the **SalesOrderID**, so rather than clearing the entire collection between bulk copy operations, the example removes all mappings except for the **SalesOrderID** mapping and then adds the appropriate mappings for the second bulk copy operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例不會執行，除非您已建立的工作資料表中所述[大量複製範例設定](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 此程式碼可示範使用語法**SqlBulkCopy**只。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果來源和目的地資料表位於相同的 SQL Server 執行個體，它是您更輕鬆且快速地使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`陳述式來複製資料。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemove/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

param.name: index
param.span: 要從集合移除之 物件以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the object to be removed from the collection.

summary.span: 移除集合指定索引處的對應。

span.span: Removes the mapping at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法最常用於當您使用單一執行個體來處理多個大量複製作業。The method is most commonly used when you use a single instance to process more than one bulk copy operation. 如果您建立一個大量複製作業的資料行對應時，您必須移除後將無法再套用的對應方法會呼叫之前先定義下一步 的大量複製的對應。If you create column mappings for one bulk copy operation, you must remove mappings that no longer apply after the method is called and before defining mapping for the next bulk copy. 您可以使用，以清除整個集合方法或使用個別的移除對應方法或方法。You can clear the entire collection by using the method, or remove mappings individually using the method or the method. 執行數個使用相同的大量複製執行個體通常更有效率的方式是從效能觀點來看比使用個別每項作業。Performing several bulk copies using the same instance will usually be more efficient from a performance point of view than using a separate for each operation. ## [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingRemoveAt/VB/source.vb#1)]
